snippet: Bank and technology stocks were higher, and traders were optimistic about a delay in the Fed’s interest rate increase.
abstract: Stocks surge, taking market to its highest level in almost two weeks.
lead_paragraph: Bank and technology stocks were higher, and traders were optimistic about a delay in the Fed’s interest rate increase.

headline.main: Financial Shares Surge on Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Financial Shares Surge on Earnings Reports
